description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. NLL Lacrosse 2010 features all eleven National Lacrosse League teams and their 250 players, custom jerseys, season mode, dive shots and all the fast paced, hard hitting professional indoor lacrosse you can handle for just 400 MSP!
description.short: NLL Lacrosse 2010 features all eleven National Lacrosse League teams and their 250 players, custom jerseys, season mode, dive shots and all the fast paced, hard hitting professional indoor lacrosse you can handle for just 400 MSP!
